history.proof: intros cP Phi Psi H. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language cP : context -> Prop Phi, Psi : {x : context | cP x} H : forall x : expr, proj1_sig Phi x <-> proj1_sig Psi x x : expr The term "proj1 (H x)" has type "proj1_sig Phi x -> proj1_sig Psi x" while it is expected to have type "?P x = ?Q x".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language

Goal:
forall (cP : context -> Prop) (Phi Psi : {x : context | cP x}), (forall x : expr, proj1_sig Phi x <-> proj1_sig Psi x) -> Phi = Psi

Premises:
expr = fun Language0 : Language => let (expr) := Language0 in expr : Language -> Type Argument Language is implicit and maximally inserted
proj1_sig : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), {x : A | P x} -> A
context = fun L : Language => expr -> Prop : Language -> Type Argument L is implicit and maximally inserted
maximal = fun (P : context -> Prop) (Phi : context) => P Phi /\ (forall Psi : context, P Psi -> Included expr Phi Psi -> Included expr Psi Phi) : (context -> Prop) -> context -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
at_least = fun P cP : context -> Prop => forall Phi : context, cP Phi -> P Phi : (context -> Prop) -> (context -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope]
consistent = fun (L : Language) (Gamma : Derivable L) (Phi : context) => exists x : expr, ~ Phi |-- x : forall L : Language, Derivable L -> context -> Prop Arguments L, Gamma are implicit and maximally inserted
satisfiable = fun (L : Language) (MD : Model) (SM : Semantics L MD) (MC : ModelClass MD) (Phi : context) => exists m : model, MC m /\ (forall x : expr, Phi x -> m |= x) : forall (L : Language) (MD : Model), Semantics L MD -> ModelClass MD -> context -> Prop Arguments L, MD, SM are implicit and maximally inserted
consequence = fun (L : Language) (_ MD0 : Model) (SM : Semantics L MD0) (MC : ModelClass MD0) (Phi : context) (y : expr) => forall m : model, MC m -> (forall x : expr, Phi x -> m |= x) -> m |= y : forall L : Language, Model -> forall MD0 : Model, Semantics L MD0 -> ModelClass MD0 -> context -> expr -> Prop Arguments L, MD, MD0, SM are implicit and maximally inserted
at_least_right : forall (P : context -> Prop) (cP1 : Ensemble context) (cP2 : context -> Prop), at_least P cP2 -> at_least P (Intersection context cP1 cP2)
PropExtensionalityFacts.PropExt_and_PropFunExt_imp_PredExt : (forall A B : Prop, A <-> B -> A = B) -> (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x = Q x) -> P = Q) -> forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q
PropExtensionalityFacts.PredExt_imp_PropFunExt : (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q) -> forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x = Q x) -> P = Q
PropExtensionalityFacts.PropExt_and_PropFunExt_iff_PredExt : (forall A B : Prop, A <-> B -> A = B) /\ (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x = Q x) -> P = Q) < -> (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q)
PropExtensionalityFacts.PredExt_imp_PropExt : (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q) -> forall A B : Prop, A < -> B -> A = B
proj3_sig : forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (e : {x : A | P x & Q x}), Q (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 e))
at_least_left : forall (P cP1 : context -> Prop) (cP2 : Ensemble context), at_least P cP1 -> at_least P (Intersection context cP1 cP2)
ssrbool.all_sig_cond_dep : forall (I : Type) (T : I -> Type) (C : ssrbool.pred I) (P : forall x : I, T x -> Prop), (forall x : I, T x) -> (forall x : I, is_true (C x) -> {y : T x | P x y}) -> {f : forall x : I, T x | forall x : I, is_true (C x) -> P x (f x)}
projT2 : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) (x : {x : A & P x}), P (projT1 x)
eq_sig_hprop_iff : (forall (x : ?A) (p q : ?P x), p = q) -> forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a}, u = v < -> proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v where ?A : [L : Language |- Type] ?P : [L : Language |- ?A -> Prop]
ssrbool.all_tag_cond_dep : forall (I : Type) (T : I -> Type) (C : ssrbool.pred I) (U : forall x : I, T x -> Type), (forall x : I, T x) -> (forall x : I, is_true (C x) -> {y : T x & U x y}) -> {f : forall x : I, T x & forall x : I, is_true (C x) -> U x (f x)}
proj2_sig : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (e : {x : A | P x}), P (proj1_sig e)
eq_sig_hprop : (forall (x : ?A) (p q : ?P x), p = q) -> forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a}, proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v -> u = v where ?A : [L : Language |- Type] ?P : [L : Language |- ?A -> Prop]
ssrbool.all_sig_cond : forall (I T : Type) (C : ssrbool.pred I) (P : I -> T -> Prop), T -> (forall x : I, is_true (C x) -> {y : T | P x y}) -> {f : I -> T | forall x : I, is_true (C x) -> P x (f x)}
sig_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> Type), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
sig_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> Set), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
sig_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> Prop), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
sig_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> SProp), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
Fin.to_nat_inj : forall p q : Fin.t ?n, proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat q) -> p = q where ?n : [L : Language |- nat]
exist2 : forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> Q x -> {x : A | P x & Q x}
proj1_sig_eq = fun (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (u v : {a : A | P a}) (p : u = v) => f_equal (proj1_sig (P:=fun a : A => P a)) p : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (u v : {a : A | P a}), u = v -> proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v Arguments A, P, u, v are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ _ _]
eq_sig_uncurried_iff : forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a}, u = v < -> {p : proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v | eq_rect (proj1_sig u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig u) (proj1_sig v) p = proj2_sig v} where ?A : [L : Language |- Type] ?P : [L : Language |- ?A -> Prop]
at_least_self : forall P : context -> Prop, at_least P P
VectorEq.eqb_eq : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), VectorEq.eqb A A_beq v1 v2 = true < -> v1 = v2
eq_sig2_nondep : forall u v : {_ : ?A | ?B & ?C}, proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u) = proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v) -> proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 u) = proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 v) -> proj3_sig u = proj3_sig v -> u = v where ?A : [L : Language |- Type] ?B : [L : Language |- Prop] ?C : [L : Language |- Prop]
exist : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x}
proj1_sig_of_sig2_eq = fun (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (u v : {a : A | P a & Q a}) (p : u = v) => proj1_sig_eq (sig_of_sig2_eq p) : forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (u v : {a : A | P a & Q a}), u = v -> proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 u) = proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 v) Arguments A, P, Q, u, v are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope _ _ _]
VectorEq.eq_dec : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), {v1 = v2} + {v1 <> v2}
eq_sig_uncurried : forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a}, {p : proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v | eq_rect (proj1_sig u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig u) (proj1_sig v) p = proj2_sig v} -> u = v where ?A : [L : Language |- Type] ?P : [L : Language |- ?A -> Prop]
eq_sig : forall (u v : {a : ?A | ?P a}) (p : proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v), eq_rect (proj1_sig u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig u) (proj1_sig v) p = proj2_sig v -> u = v where ?A : [L : Language |- Type] ?P : [L : Language |- ?A -> Prop]
eq_sig_rect : forall Q : ?u = ?v -> Type, (forall (p : proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) p = proj2_sig ?v), Q (eq_sig ?u ?v p q)) -> forall p : ?u = ?v, Q p where ?A : [L : Language |- Type] ?P : [L : Language |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [L : Language |- {a : ?A | ?P a}] ?v : [L : Language |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
eq_sig_ind : forall Q : ?u = ?v -> Prop, (forall (p : proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) p = proj2_sig ?v), Q (eq_sig ?u ?v p q)) -> forall p : ?u = ?v, Q p where ?A : [L : Language |- Type] ?P : [L : Language |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [L : Language |- {a : ?A | ?P a}] ?v : [L : Language |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
eq_sig_rec : forall Q : ?u = ?v -> Set, (forall (p : proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) p = proj2_sig ?v), Q (eq_sig ?u ?v p q)) -> forall p : ?u = ?v, Q p where ?A : [L : Language |- Type] ?P : [L : Language |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [L : Language |- {a : ?A | ?P a}] ?v : [L : Language |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
Refl.make_impl_map : forall (A B : Type) (eval : A -> Prop) (eval' : A * B -> Prop) (l : list (A * B)) (r : Prop), (forall x : A * B, eval' x <-> eval (fst x)) -> Refl.make_impl eval' l r < -> Refl.make_impl eval (map fst l) r
exists_to_inhabited_sig : (exists x : ?A, ?P x) -> inhabited {x : ?A | ?P x} where ?A : [L : Language |- Type] ?P : [L : Language |- ?A -> Prop]

```coq
intros cP Phi Psi H.
apply (PropExtensionalityFacts.PredExt_imp_PropFunExt _ _ _ (fun x => proj1 (H x))).
Qed.```

original: intros cP Phi Psi H. apply (PropExtensionalityFacts.PredExt_imp_PropFunExt _ _ _ (fun x => proj1 (H x))).
